heroDescription: Generate comprehensive business and technical strategies tailored to your specific idea using our advanced AI technology. Special focus on Syrian market data and regional opportunities.
aboutDescription: Planlyze AI is your intelligent business strategist that transforms your software ideas into actionable plans. Powered by advanced artificial intelligence and enriched with comprehensive Syrian market data, our platform delivers personalized business strategies and technical roadmaps in minutes.
feature1Desc: Get detailed market analysis, competitor research, and revenue models tailored to your specific industry and target market.
feature2Desc: Receive comprehensive technical specifications, technology stack recommendations, and development roadmaps.
feature3Desc: Access specialized insights about Syrian market conditions, local opportunities, and regional business landscapes.
feature4Desc: Get step-by-step implementation plans with timelines, milestones, and resource requirements.
feature5Desc: Get detailed financial forecasts, revenue models, and cost analysis for your business idea.
feature6Desc: Understand your competitive landscape with detailed analysis of market players and positioning strategies.
partnersTitle: Our Partners Through Guidance And Training
partnersSubtitle: Join the ecosystem of innovation and growth
benefit1Desc: The only AI tool specifically trained on Syrian market data, regulations, and business opportunities.
benefit2Desc: Get everything you need: business plan, technical specs, action plan, and pitch deck in one place.
benefit3Desc: Generate comprehensive strategies in minutes, not weeks of manual research and planning.
benefit4Desc: All recommendations backed by real market data, industry trends, and proven methodologies.
step1Desc: Tell us about your software concept and target market
step2Desc: Our AI analyzes your idea against Syrian market data and global trends
step3Desc: Receive complete business strategy and technical plan
ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of Syrian entrepreneurs who've used Planlyze AI to build successful businesses
pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs
faq1A: Planlyze AI is an AI-powered platform that generates comprehensive business strategies, technical roadmaps, and pitch decks tailored to your specific software idea, with special focus on Syrian market data.
faq2Q: How long does it take to generate a report?
faq2A: Most reports are generated within 2-5 minutes. The AI analyzes your idea, researches market data, and creates a comprehensive strategy document.
faq3Q: Is my business idea kept confidential?
faq3A: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and never share your ideas with third parties. Your data is protected by strict security measures.
faq4Q: What's included in a premium report?
faq4A: Premium reports include competitor analysis, Syrian market data, AI predictions, risk analysis, interactive AI Assistant for Q&A, and export options in PDF and Excel formats.
faq5A: Single credits never expire. Bundle package credits are valid for 12 months from the purchase date.
faq6A: Yes, we offer refunds within 7 days of purchase if you haven't used your credits. Contact our support team for assistance.
faq7Q: What's next after studying my Planlyze report?
faq7A: Your Planlyze report is your strategic foundation. The next steps depend on your goals: you can approach investors with your comprehensive business plan, seek strategic partners to accelerate growth, or proceed directly to market launch with your validated roadmap. We don't provide code—we provide the strategic clarity you need to make informed decisions about your venture's future.
contactSubtitle: Have questions? We're here to help!
footerDesc: Empowering entrepreneurs to turn software ideas into reality with AI-powered strategies and comprehensive education.
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Planlyze, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. As an AI-powered business strategy platform, we understand the sensitive nature of your business ideas and data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information in compliance with applicable data protection laws.
privacyPolicy.section1Content: We collect several types of information: (1) Account Information: name, email address, phone number, country, and preferred language when you register; (2) Business Idea Data: your business concepts, industry preferences, target markets, and any details you provide for analysis; (3) Payment Information: processed securely through third-party payment providers - we do not store complete payment card details; (4) Usage Data: how you interact with our platform, features used, and session analytics; (5) Device Information: browser type, IP address, device identifiers, and operating system for security and optimization purposes.
privacyPolicy.section2Content: Your information is used to: (1) Generate personalized AI-powered business analysis reports; (2) Provide and improve our platform services; (3) Process transactions and manage your account; (4) Communicate service updates, security alerts, and support responses; (5) Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience; (6) Comply with legal obligations and protect against fraud. We explicitly DO NOT use your business ideas to train our AI models or share them with third parties.
privacyPolicy.section3Content: Your business ideas are processed by our AI system to generate strategic reports. Important: (1) Your ideas are processed in real-time and not stored for AI training purposes; (2) We use third-party AI providers (Anthropic Claude) with strict data processing agreements; (3) AI providers are contractually prohibited from using your data for their own training; (4) Generated reports are stored securely and accessible only to you; (5) We implement prompt isolation to prevent cross-user data leakage.
privacyPolicy.section4Content: We implement comprehensive security measures: (1) 256-bit AES encryption for data at rest; (2) TLS 1.3 encryption for all data in transit; (3) Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments; (4) Access controls with role-based permissions; (5) Secure cloud infrastructure with enterprise-grade protection; (6) Regular backups with encrypted storage; (7) Incident response procedures for potential breaches.
privacyPolicy.section5Content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. We may share data with: (1) Service Providers: hosting, payment processing, and analytics services under strict confidentiality agreements; (2) AI Processing Partners: Anthropic for AI analysis, bound by data processing agreements; (3) Legal Requirements: when required by law, court order, or to protect our rights; (4) Business Transfers: in the event of merger or acquisition, with continued privacy protections.
privacyPolicy.section6Content: You have the right to: (1) Access your personal data and request a copy; (2) Correct inaccurate or incomplete information; (3) Delete your account and associated data; (4) Export your data in a portable format; (5) Opt-out of marketing communications; (6) Restrict or object to certain data processing; (7) Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent. Contact info@planlyze.com to exercise these rights.
privacyPolicy.section7Content: We retain your data as follows: (1) Account information: retained while your account is active and for 3 years after deletion for legal compliance; (2) Generated reports: retained until you delete them or close your account; (3) Transaction records: retained for 7 years for tax and legal requirements; (4) Usage logs: retained for 2 years for analytics and security; (5) Upon account deletion, personal data is permanently removed within 30 days, except where retention is legally required.
privacyPolicy.section8Content: We use cookies and similar technologies for: (1) Essential Functions: authentication, security, and session management; (2) Analytics: understanding usage patterns to improve our service; (3) Preferences: remembering your language and display settings. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings. Blocking essential cookies may affect platform functionality.
privacyPolicy.section9Content: Your data may be processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards through: (1) Standard contractual clauses approved by regulatory authorities; (2) Selecting processors with adequate data protection certifications; (3) Implementing technical measures to protect data during transfer. For users in the EU/EEA, we comply with GDPR transfer requirements.
privacyPolicy.section10Content: Planlyze is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that a child has provided us with personal information, we will promptly delete it. If you believe a child has provided us with their data, please contact us immediately.
privacyPolicy.section11Content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification. The 'Last Updated' date indicates when changes were made. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacyPolicy.section12Content: For privacy-related inquiries, data requests, or complaints, contact us at: Email: info@planlyze.com. We aim to respond to all requests within 30 days. If you are unsatisfied with our response, you may lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to Planlyze. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of our AI-powered business analysis platform. By creating an account or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Please read them carefully.
termsOfService.section1Content: By accessing or using Planlyze, you confirm that: (1) You are at least 18 years old; (2) You have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements; (3) You will comply with these Terms and all applicable laws; (4) If using on behalf of an organization, you have authority to bind that organization. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not use our platform.
termsOfService.section2Content: Planlyze provides AI-powered business analysis services including: (1) Business idea validation and analysis; (2) Market research and competitor analysis reports; (3) Technical architecture recommendations; (4) Financial projections and strategy planning; (5) Interactive AI assistant for report clarification. Our services are informational and advisory in nature - they do not constitute professional business, legal, or financial advice.
termsOfService.section3Content: To use Planlyze, you must: (1) Provide accurate, current, and complete registration information; (2) Maintain the security and confidentiality of your login credentials; (3) Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access; (4) Not share your account or transfer it to others. You are responsible for all activities under your account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.
termsOfService.section4Content: Our credit-based system works as follows: (1) Credits are required for premium report generation; (2) Free reports have limited features and analysis depth; (3) Credits are purchased in advance and are non-refundable once used; (4) Unused credits do not expire for single purchases; bundle credits expire after 12 months; (5) Prices are subject to change with 30 days notice; (6) Refunds are available within 7 days of purchase for unused credits only; (7) We reserve the right to modify credit requirements for services.
termsOfService.section5Content: Ownership is divided as follows: (1) Your Content: You retain all rights to your business ideas, concepts, and information you submit; (2) Generated Reports: You own the generated analysis reports for your personal and business use; (3) Platform IP: Planlyze owns all rights to the platform, including AI models, algorithms, design, and underlying technology; (4) Feedback: Any suggestions or feedback you provide may be used by us without obligation. You grant us a limited license to process your content solely to provide our services.
termsOfService.section6Content: You agree not to: (1) Use the platform for illegal purposes or to promote illegal activities; (2) Submit content that is defamatory, obscene, or violates third-party rights; (3) Attempt to reverse-engineer, hack, or compromise platform security; (4) Circumvent usage limits, access controls, or payment systems; (5) Use automated systems to access the platform without permission; (6) Resell, redistribute, or commercially exploit our services without authorization; (7) Submit false or misleading information; (8) Interfere with other users' access to the platform.
termsOfService.section7Content: You acknowledge that: (1) Reports are generated by artificial intelligence and may contain errors or inaccuracies; (2) AI analysis is based on available data and algorithms, not guaranteed predictions; (3) Reports are for informational purposes and should not replace professional advice; (4) Market conditions, regulations, and circumstances change - reports reflect analysis at generation time; (5) You are responsible for verifying information and making independent business decisions; (6) We do not guarantee business success or specific outcomes from using our analysis.
termsOfService.section8Content: To the maximum extent permitted by law: (1) Planlyze is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind; (2) We disclaim all implied warranties including merchantability and fitness for purpose; (3) We are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages; (4) Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the 12 months prior to the claim; (5) We are not responsible for decisions made based on our reports; (6) We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.
termsOfService.section9Content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Planlyze, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses (including legal fees) arising from: (1) Your use of the platform; (2) Your violation of these Terms; (3) Your violation of any third-party rights; (4) Content you submit to the platform; (5) Your business activities based on our reports.
termsOfService.section10Content: Either party may terminate this agreement: (1) You may close your account at any time through settings or by contacting support; (2) We may suspend or terminate accounts for Terms violations; (3) We may discontinue services with 30 days notice; (4) Upon termination, your right to use the platform ends immediately; (5) Provisions regarding IP, liability, and indemnification survive termination; (6) No refunds are provided for unused credits upon voluntary termination.
termsOfService.section11Content: Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be: (1) First attempted to be resolved through good-faith negotiation; (2) If unresolved after 30 days, submitted to binding arbitration; (3) Arbitration shall be conducted in accordance with applicable arbitration rules; (4) The arbitration decision shall be final and binding; (5) Each party bears its own arbitration costs unless otherwise determined. You waive the right to participate in class action lawsuits against Planlyze.
termsOfService.section12Content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any legal proceedings shall be brought in courts of competent jurisdiction. If any provision is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions continue in effect.
termsOfService.section13Content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes via email or platform notification at least 30 days before they take effect. Continued use after the effective date constitutes acceptance. If you disagree with changes, you must stop using the platform and close your account.
termsOfService.section14Content: For questions about these Terms, contact us at: Email: info@planlyze.com. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 5 business days.
ideaSecurity.title: Idea Security & Confidentiality
ideaSecurity.subtitle: Your Ideas Are Safe With Us
ideaSecurity.intro: Your business ideas are your most valuable intellectual assets. At Planlyze, we understand the competitive nature of entrepreneurship and have implemented enterprise-grade security measures to ensure your ideas remain completely confidential and protected from unauthorized access.
ideaSecurity.section1Content: All data transmitted between your device and our servers is protected using TLS 1.3 encryption with perfect forward secrecy. Your ideas are encrypted both in transit and at rest using 256-bit AES encryption, the same standard used by financial institutions and government agencies.
ideaSecurity.section2Content: We have a strict zero-sharing policy: (1) Your business ideas are NEVER sold, shared, or distributed to third parties; (2) Your ideas are NOT used to train our AI models or any external AI systems; (3) We do not share data with competitors, investors, or other users; (4) Our AI processing partner (Anthropic) is contractually prohibited from retaining or using your data; (5) Employee access to user data is strictly limited and logged.
ideaSecurity.section3Content: Our platform is hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure featuring: (1) SOC 2 Type II certified data centers; (2) Multiple layers of firewalls and intrusion detection systems; (3) DDoS protection and threat mitigation; (4) Automatic failover and disaster recovery systems; (5) Geographic data redundancy for reliability; (6) Regular security audits by independent third parties.
ideaSecurity.section4Content: Your data is protected by comprehensive access controls: (1) Only you can access your ideas and generated reports; (2) Role-based access ensures employees only access necessary data; (3) All access is logged and monitored for anomalies; (4) Two-factor authentication available for enhanced account security; (5) Automatic session timeout for inactive accounts; (6) IP-based access monitoring and suspicious activity alerts.
ideaSecurity.section5Content: You have complete control over your data: (1) Delete individual reports or ideas at any time; (2) Request complete account deletion with full data removal; (3) Deleted data is permanently removed from active systems within 30 days; (4) Backup data is purged within 90 days of deletion request; (5) We provide data export in standard formats upon request; (6) No 'soft delete' - when you delete, the data is truly removed.
ideaSecurity.section6Content: We maintain compliance with international standards: (1) GDPR compliance for European users; (2) Regular security assessments and penetration testing; (3) Employee background checks and security training; (4) Vendor security assessments for all third-party services; (5) Incident response procedures with 24-hour notification commitment; (6) Data processing agreements with all service providers.
ideaSecurity.guaranteeItems: 256-bit AES encryption for all stored data
TLS 1.3 encryption for all data in transit
No AI training on your submitted ideas
Strict employee access controls and NDA requirements
ideaSecurity.confidentialityContent: Every idea submitted to Planlyze is treated with the highest level of confidentiality: (1) All employees and contractors sign comprehensive Non-Disclosure Agreements; (2) We operate on a strict need-to-know basis for data access; (3) Our AI processing is designed with privacy-by-design principles; (4) We never review your ideas for purposes other than providing our service; (5) Legal hold procedures protect your data from unauthorized disclosure.
ideaSecurity.contactContent: If you have questions about our security measures, need to report a security concern, or want to request a security audit report, please contact our security team at: info@planlyze.com. We take all security reports seriously and aim to respond within 24 hours.
